DOC.brief_summary: The study design investigate effect luteal-phase administration gonadotrophin release hormone agonist ( GnRHa ) pregnancy outcomes in-vitro fertilization-embryo transfer .
DOC.brief_title: Gonadotrophin Releasing Hormone Agonist Addition Luteal Support In-vitro Fertilization Embryo Transfer Cycles
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age < 37 year ; 2 . One high quality embryos get IVF/ICSI treatment ; 3 . To transfer l 2 fresh embryo ; 4 . Uterine endometrial thickness ≥ 7mm ; 5 . Patients sign informed consent . 1 . ≥3 IVF/ICSI/FET cycle pregnancy ; 2 . Polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) ; 3. uterine malformation ; 4. endometriosis 5. patient history recurrent pregnancy loss .
